PAGE_INSTRUCTION: Please read through below and then click "Employee" on the navbar
li1: Make sure running in server and request root localhost/, since angular reads data.json and Cross origin requests work only in server
li2: localization is achieved by introducting angular-i18n/angular-locale_zh.js. Currency will change when shifting language (Salary column)
li3: click table header to sort asc/desc
li4: select all/none by clicking first checkbox
li5: one by one check every checkbox will automatically check first checkbox
li7: add button will add an empty row, type on the fields and click save.
li8: clicking only cellphone cell enables editing mode
Name: Name
